app.config([ 'formioComponentsProvider', function (formioComponentsProvider) { formioComponentsProvider.register('initializer', { group: 'data', fbtemplate: 'formio/formbuilder/initializers.html', title: 'Initializer', template: 'formio/components/initializers.html', icon: 'fa fa-sliders', settings: { input: false, tableView: false, key: 'initializerField', label: '', protected: false, unique: false, persistent: false, initializerData: { dataInputObject: [], dataOutputObject: [] }, triggerType: 'watch' }, views: [ { name: 'Initializer', template: 'formio/components/common/initializer.html' } ], }); } ]);
